name: Google Cloud Natural Language Tool
semantic_context: Consume Google Cloud Natural Language API
natural_language_description: 这是 Google Cloud Natural Language Tool 节点。主要用于: Consume Google Cloud Natural Language API

descriptionType.name: descriptionType
descriptionType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Tool Description | 默认值: auto
available_options: Set Automatically (值: auto) - Automatically set based on resource and operation
Set Manually (值: manual) - Manually set the description

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.default: Consume Google Cloud Natural Language API
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.natural_language_description: 参数名: Description | 作用: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often | 默认值: Consume Google Cloud Natural Language API | (必填项)

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: document

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: analyzeSentiment

source.name: source
source.description: The source of the document: a string containing the content or a Google Cloud Storage URI
source.natural_language_description: 参数名: Source | 作用: The source of the document: a string containing the content or a Google Cloud Storage URI | 默认值: content | (必填项)

content.name: content
content.description: The content of the input in string format. Cloud audit logging exempt since it is based on user data.
content.natural_language_description: 参数名: Content | 作用: The content of the input in string format. Cloud audit logging exempt since it is based on user data. | (必填项)

gcsContentUri.name: gcsContentUri
gcsContentUri.description: The Google Cloud Storage URI where the file content is located. This URI must be of the form: `gs://bucket_name/object_name`. For more details, see reference.
gcsContentUri.natural_language_description: 参数名: Google Cloud Storage URI | 作用: The Google Cloud Storage URI where the file content is located. This URI must be of the form: `gs://bucket_name/object_name`. For more details, see reference. | (必填项)

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: documentType (值: None) - The type of input document
encodingType (值: None) - The encoding type used by the API to calculate sentence offsets
language (值: None) - The language of the document (if not specified, the language is automatically detected). Both ISO and BCP-47 language codes are accepted.
